author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:
Part of the migration in #31061 and #36404.
Went systematically through all of the CMSDEPRECATED_X warnings in the `RecoLocalTracker` subsystem from `CMSSW_12_3_CMSDEPRECATED_X_2021-12-15-2300` and removed deprecated API calls.
 * removed unnecessary header includes
 * added `esConsumes`
 * profited to reorganize `RecoLocalTracker/SiStripClusterizer/test/` plugins

Still to do:
   * ~~remove `endl` at the end of LogMessages;~~
   * remove occurrences of deprecated  `getByLabel`;
    
#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compliles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Removed CMS deprecated warnings from `RecoLocalTracker`
